actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the penalty on the reimportation of tobacco products exported from the United States shall not apply in certain cases.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Service to exempt from penalty certain tobacco products reimported into the United States tax and duty free.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the penalty on the reimportation of tobacco products exported from the United States shall not apply in certain cases.
